actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: Resolved, that it is the sense of the Senate that the Bureau of Sport Fisheries and Wildlife is hereby urged and requested to conclude a new national wetlands inventory by the year 1976.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Bureau of Sport Fisheries and Wildlife is hereby urged and requested to conclude a new national wetlands inventory by the year 1976.

titles.title: Resolved, that it is the sense of the Senate that the Bureau of Sport Fisheries and Wildlife is hereby urged and requested to conclude a new national wetlands inventory by the year 1976.
